newsitem.title: POLAND: LUBAWA TO PAY PLN 210,000 IN DIVIDENDS.
newsitem.headline: LUBAWA TO PAY PLN 210,000 IN DIVIDENDS.

text.p: Shareholders of Polish technical garment maker Lubawa SA will vote on March 22 on whether to pay dividends of 210,000 zlotys from its 1996 net profit of 1.9 million zlotys, the company said in a statement.
Lubawa also proposed that 28,000 zlotys from profits go to a special social fund for employees and that 1.7 million zlotys go to reserves.
Shareholders will also vote on whether to convert 600,000 registered shares to common shares, the statement said.
Lubawa currently has 1.4 million shares outstanding.
